1.0.0.name: wordpress/google-monthly-xml-sitemap
1.0.0.description:
Automatically generate sitemap divided by month to scale for large website and to reduce the load of each post generation excluding old posts and page from this operation. This plugin is a great improvement related to all other XML sitemap plugins cause it help you and your hosting company to reduce the load of XML sitemaps generation limiting the number of posts and page scanned on each post update and publish to the last month. The oldest sitemap are archived so this remove unnecessary work. For big website this is actually the only plugin that can works.

More info:

  • More info on Google News Sitemap, with info on how to configure it.
  • Check out the other Wordpress plugins by the same author, and read his blog: Andrea.
  • The sitemaps are stored in your wp-content/uploads
